overview: Rural Electrification in Ohio:  Historic REA Films 1940-1941 is a companion DVD to Power for the Parkinsons and The Parkinsons, both narrated by Walter Cronkite. Aired on PBS.  It contains Power and the Land, Bip Goes to Town and Worst of Farm Disasters.
tagline: Rural Electrification in Ohio: Historic REA Films 1940-1941 is a companion DVD to Power for the Parkinsons and The Parkinsons. Aired on PBS.
title: Rural Electrification in Ohio
